routingRules.name: Code Questions → DeepSeek
routingRules.rationale: DeepSeek is optimized for code ($0.14/M tokens, 9/10 speed)

routingRules.name: Quick Simple Questions → Gemini
routingRules.rationale: Gemini is fast and cheap for simple queries ($0.50/M tokens, 8/10 speed)

routingRules.name: Vision & Image Analysis → Gemini or Claude
routingRules.rationale: Both Gemini and Claude support vision, routing selects best available

routingRules.name: Long Context → Claude or Gemini
routingRules.rationale: Claude and Gemini support long context windows

routingRules.name: Maximum Quality → Claude
routingRules.rationale: Claude provides highest quality (10/10) for critical decisions

routingRules.name: Budget-Conscious → DeepSeek
routingRules.rationale: DeepSeek is cheapest option ($0.14/M tokens) while maintaining quality

notes: Keywords are case-insensitive and matched against the query text
Pattern uses regex matching (more flexible than keywords)
First matching rule wins, so order matters
If no rules match, optimization settings determine the best model
You can combine multiple optimization modes (cost + quality balancing)
